content: @XAMPPRocky suggested creating this stream so that people can ask questions and we can have some discussion here
is this intended as last year's #all-hands on discord?
(to serve as well as the chat platform for the days in greece)
in that case we might want to make it private, with all the attendees in it
Yeah, and I intend to BCC this stream for future emails, so if people aren't on the mailing lists they can see the announcements.
@Pietro Albini Sure, though I don't know if we do that now, since everyone is just starting to send out invites. Probably closer to the event itself.
:thumbs_up:
would be nice to have zulip synchronized with the team repo so we don't have to deal with adding people here
I guess I'll ask pietro to implement that
@Pietro Albini Well we do want non team repo members here as well.

I guess I'll ask pietro to implement that

please do, if you find him :P

I guess I'll ask pietro to implement that

I don't know, I hear he's kind of busy these days :laughing:
Would anyone be interested in sharing a hotel room? As long as there are two beds I don't really feel the need to have a room all to myself.
